sentences.sContent: The impressions are wrong, people now no longer discriminate each other, the crimination only exists in few people.
sentences.sContent_eng: The impressions are wrong, people now no longer discriminate each other, the crimination only exists in few people.
sentences.sCn: 这些印象都是错误的，人们现在不再彼此歧视，歧视只在少数人身上存在。

remMethod.val: dis + crimin(罪行) + ate → 一种罪行 → 歧视

words.tran: 有辨识力的；差别对待的
识别的；有差别的；有识别力的
区别的，歧视的；有识别力的

trans.tranOther: to treat a person or group differently from another in an unfair way
